data.enText: the activities that are done in order to plan, organize and run a business, school or other institution
Administration costs are passed on to the customer.
data.chText: 行政费用转嫁给了消费者。

data.enText: the day-to-day administration of a company
I work in the Sales Administration department.
data.chText: 我在销售管理部门工作。

data.enText: the process or act of organizing the way that sth is done
the people who plan, organize and run a business, an institution, etc.
data.chText: （企业、学校等的）管理部门，行政部门

data.enText: the government of a country, especially the US
Successive administrations have failed to solve the country's economic problems.
data.chText: 一届又一届政府均未能解决这个国家的经济问题。

data.enText: the act of giving a drug to sb

simple_means.memory_skill: administer 管理;负责 + -ation 名词后缀

tr: the act of meting out justice according to the law

example: regulations for the governing of state prisons
he had considerable experience of government

tr: a method of tending to or managing the affairs of a some group of people (especially the group's business affairs)
the persons (or committees or departments etc.) who make up a body for the purpose of administering something
example: he claims that the present administration is corrupt
the governance of an association is responsible to its members
he quickly became recognized as a member of the establishment
things were quiet during the Eisenhower administration

example.ex: Too much time is spent on administration.
example.tran: 在管理上花费了太多时间。

value.def: Administration is the range of activities connected with organizing and supervising the way that an organization or institution functions.

example.ex: Standards in the administration of justice have degenerated...
The cost of administration is around £500.

value.def: The administration of something is the process of organizing and supervising it.

example.ex: ... a member of the college administration.

value.def: The administration of a company or institution is the group of people who organize and supervise it.
value.tran: （公司或机构的）管理部门，行政部门

example.ex: O'Leary served in federal energy posts in both the Ford and Carter administrations...
example.tran: 在福特和卡特两届政府执政期间，奥利里都在联邦能源机构中任职。

example.ex: He urged the administration and Congress to come up with a credible package to reduce the budget deficit.
example.tran: 他敦促政府和国会出台一整套切实可行的方案，以缩减预算赤字。

value.def: You can refer to a country's government as the administration; used especially in the United States.

trans: 公共行政；行政管理；行政
总管理处；总经营管理，最高经营管理
美国食品和药物管理局；食品和药物管理局；美国食品药品管理局；食品药品监督管理局；食品和药品管理局
行政部；行政部门；管理部；行政管理部
教育行政，教育行政管理
